title: Quality-First Onboarding Framework
description: Implement mandatory V2 compliance validation during agent onboarding process with automated quality gates testing
rationale: Prevents compliance violations from day one by ensuring all agents understand and can validate V2 standards before operational deployment
category_description: Agent onboarding improvements and training enhancements
captain_notes: Excellent proposal! Quality-first approach aligns perfectly with V2 compliance. Implement immediately in enhanced onboarding.
